name: Advanced Bipedal Battle Armour: The Name of the Game
name_original: Advanced Bipedal Battle Armour: The Name of the Game
description:
It all comes down to this. Friends, lovers, now rivals: Duel it out with your prized Advanced Bipedal Battle Armour to prevent a cataclysmic merger of worlds!

CONTROLS KEYBOARD GAMEPAD Move WASD / Arrows Left stick / D-pad Dash Shift / X / V A / Y Fire Space / Z / C B / X

Made by Sean, Michael, and IAN for MechJam II.
